mapper.select: select distinct xmmc from t_xm where xmmc is not null

select t.XM_ID as XM_ID , t.XMLX as XMLX , t.XMZM as XMZM , t.GLXMMCID as GLXMMCID , t.XMMC as XMMC , t.XMBH as XMBH , t.XMKSSJ as XMKSSJ , t.SMJSSJ as SMJSSJ , t.XMJLTS as XMJLTS , t.XMCC as XMCC , t.JFLY as JFLY , t.ZJJE as ZJJE , t.XMGK as XMGK , t.XMZZJH as XMZZJH , t.JLJGMC as JLJGMC , t.FYBZ as FYBZ , t.ZYSM as ZYSM , t.SFXZRS as SFXZRS , t.JHRS as JHRS , t.CCXZ as CCXZ , t.XMNJXZ as XMNJXZ , t.YYYQ as YYYQ , t.XMZYXZ as XMZYXZ , t.GSYXDM as GSYXDM , t.GSYXMC as GSYXMC , t.GSXSDM as GSXSDM , t.GSXSXM as GSXSXM , t.OPERATOR_CODE as OPERATOR_CODE , t.BMJZSJ as BMJZSJ , t.STATUS as STATUS , t.VALID as VALID , t.CREATE_TIME as CREATE_TIME , t.GBDQ as GBDQ ,
nvl(jl.status,'00')|| '-' || nvl(jl.confirm_status,'00') as SQ_STATUS, jl.sqjl_id as SQJL_ID, jl.isconfirm1 as is_comfirm1, jl.isconfirm2 as is_comfirm2, jl.self_pay as self_pay, t.YYYQSM as YYYQSM from t_xm t left join t_xm_xssqjl jl on jl.xm_id = t.xm_id and jl.xh = #{gsxsdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where t.valid = '1' and t.status ='02' and t.bmjzsj >= sysdate-1 and jl.status is null
and (
t.xmcc = '01'
or (t.xmcc ='02' and t.gsyxdm =#{gsyxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
or (t.xmcc ='03' and t.gsxsdm =#{gsxsdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) )
and (
t.ccxz like ( '%'||#{ccxz}||'%' )
or t.ccxz = '99' )
and (
t.xmnjxz = #{xmnjxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
or t.xmnjxz is null )
and (
t.xmmc like #{xmmcLike,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
or t.xmzm like #{xmzmLike,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

select t.XM_ID as XM_ID , t.XMLX as XMLX , t.XMZM as XMZM , t.GLXMMCID as GLXMMCID , t.XMMC as XMMC , t.XMBH as XMBH , t.XMKSSJ as XMKSSJ , t.SMJSSJ as SMJSSJ , t.XMJLTS as XMJLTS , t.XMCC as XMCC , t.JFLY as JFLY , t.ZJJE as ZJJE , t.XMGK as XMGK , t.XMZZJH as XMZZJH , t.JLJGMC as JLJGMC , t.FYBZ as FYBZ , t.ZYSM as ZYSM , t.SFXZRS as SFXZRS , t.JHRS as JHRS , t.CCXZ as CCXZ , t.XMNJXZ as XMNJXZ , t.YYYQ as YYYQ , t.XMZYXZ as XMZYXZ , t.GSYXDM as GSYXDM , t.GSYXMC as GSYXMC , t.GSXSDM as GSXSDM , t.GSXSXM as GSXSXM , t.OPERATOR_CODE as OPERATOR_CODE , t.BMJZSJ as BMJZSJ , t.STATUS as STATUS , t.VALID as VALID , t.CREATE_TIME as CREATE_TIME , t.GBDQ as GBDQ ,
nvl(jl.status,'00')|| '-' || nvl(jl.confirm_status,'00') as SQ_STATUS, jl.sqjl_id as SQJL_ID, jl.isconfirm1 as is_comfirm1, jl.isconfirm2 as is_comfirm2, jl.self_pay as self_pay, t.YYYQSM as YYYQSM from t_xm t left join t_xm_xssqjl jl on jl.xm_id = t.xm_id and jl.xh = #{gsxsdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where t.valid = '1' and t.status ='02' and (
t.xmcc = '01'
or (t.xmcc ='02' and t.gsyxdm =#{gsyxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
or (t.xmcc ='03' and t.gsxsdm =#{gsxsdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ) and jl.status is not null
and (
